mapper.select: SELECT SUM(quantity) AS 'skuQuantity', COUNT(p.sku_id) AS 'productQuantity', SUM(quantity * price) AS 'previewPrice' FROM platform_order_content JOIN (SELECT sku_id, price FROM sku_price GROUP BY sku_id HAVING MAX(date) ) p ON p.sku_id = platform_order_content.sku_id WHERE platform_order_content.platform_order_id IN (${orderIds})
